column4: hello people i wanna know how i can apply some type of censorship to a photo in kubuntu with a program, someone knows?
hello people i wanna know how i can apply some type of censorship to a photo in kubuntu with any native photo editing program, someone knows?
hello people i wanna know how i can apply some type of censorship to a photo in kubuntu with any native photo editing program, someone knows?
don't spam channel
I was about to help you, so here goes
the tool you want to use is pixelate censor
yes Gnu Image manipulation progrm
are you taking out an entire object or just blurring something?
is it ok for me to pm you? Perhaps I can help you through the steps of acquiring gimp?
sudo aptitude install gimp?
thanks for your help buddie :)
no problem
where is the pix censor button ingimp?
see this: http://www.recipester.org/Recipe:Create_frosted_pixels_effect_32639875
or this: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ML2oAQ0PvKk
the best reference is the gimp pages: http://docs.gimp.org/en/filters-blur.html
what you want is the Pixellize filter after you make your selection with the selection tool
that's if you want the censored area to have squares - for irregular blobs - use oilify
everything okay now? I must go afk shortly
all ok, thanks dude!
have fun w/ the gimp!
